Posts.Content: Lilanj wrote: I just had ultrasound done on Friday on my right breast and right axillary, won’t know the results until my doctor is in on Monday. Radiologist gave me the images from the session. Both masses are over 2cm. The axillary lump was discovered end of February and the breast lump middle of April while I was still nursing. Was reading that it could be PABC, I just gave birth in January. I’m so terrified of what it could be and not seeing my child grow up Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting and scared Lilanj Lilanj

Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2018 12:40PM Lilanj wrote: Just wanted to provide an update to you ladies. I had my biopsies (fine needle of lymph node and core of right breast) today. The FNA shows positive for cancer. Thank you all for your words, I’ll be moving on to the other forum
Posts.Title: Waiting and scared Lilanj Lilanj
